resources.string:
What is this app?

Student Junction is an app made by Jahnavi Thejo Prakash, currently in high school, made for students. This app collates useful features for students.

This boosts students to focus, plan and utilise their time effectively. In other words, the app should help students successfully complete their assignments and avoid procrastination.
What is in this app?\n\nThe app has four main sections: calendar, todo, notes, quotes.
Quotes\n\nIn the quotes tab, you can read few inspirational/motivational quotes. This will help you to motivate and achieve your goals.
Calendar\n\nCalendar helps you plan your tasks.
ToDo\n\nToDo helps you create new tasks and track which tasks are completed.
Notes\n\nNotes is used to capture all the fun ideas and creative thoughts, which can occur at anytime. You can put quick tips as reference for exam review
